readRow

public int[] readRow(int[] buffer,
                     int nrow)
Reads a line and returns it as a int array Buffer can be prealocated (in this case it must have enough len!) or can be null See also the other overloaded method

Parameters:
buffer -
nrow -
Returns:
The same buffer if it was allocated, a newly allocated one otherwise
